docs.text: this is the first film in what would become the most successful series of horror films of all time .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a fair warning to those of you who might be inclined to watch this movie for the first appearance of everyone's favorite goalie-mask-wearing homicidal maniac .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: jason , the guy who single handedly controlled the overpopulation problem around the crystal lake area , doesn't start his quest to find the most interesting household item with which to kill someone until the sequel .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while he does have a small role in this film , we the audience have to depend on another blood thirsty maniac to rack up the body count .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot , like every other friday the 13th movie goes something like this -- crazed killer murders as many unsuspecting teenagers as he/she/it possibly can in the space of a 90 minute movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the reasons that the afore mentioned unsuspecting teenagers come into contact with the bloodthirsty killer are usually of little importance to the story .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but for those of you out there that might actually care about such trivial matters in a movie such as a plot , here are the basics .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a bunch of unsuspecting teens get a summer job at a long closed summer camp .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they are days away from the arrival of the kids and they are spending their time fixing the place up and making sure it is ready for the kids .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sadly , they start being butchered one by one by the bloodthirsty killer .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: at this point i would usually say something about the quality of acting , directing or maybe something about the high quality of the production .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: since i'm not going to do that , feel free to assume that if i did , it wouldn't be positive .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i will say that this movie looks as if it was made for about a hundred bucks , and that includes the actors' salaries .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if you are used to recent horror films like scream , you are in for a bit of a surprise .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the only saving grace for friday the 13th is that it was really the first of its kind , with the killer taking real pride in their work .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: using as many methods of murder as they could .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: none of this single murder weapon stuff life that unimaginative leatherface in chainsaw massacre , or the creatively stifled imagination of halloween's michael myers who just used brute force or a really big kitchen knife .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: nope , in the friday the 13th movies , you can always count on the killer taking great pride in his work .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one fun fact about this movie is that the cast includes a very young kevin bacon , although after this movie it is a wonder he ever worked again .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the main reason to see friday the 13th is if you want to watch all of the series from the beginning .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if not , stick with the later films with jason , everyone's favorite hockey fan .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: friday the 13th is the sort of movie that is fun to sit down and get a couple of scares from , just don't sit down expecting a whole lot .
docs.label: negative
